metadata.title: USN-7197-1 -- Go Networking vulnerability
metadata.description: Guido Vranken discovered that Go Networking handled input to the Parse functions inefficiently. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause denial of service. This update addresses the issue in the golang-golang-x-net and golang-golang-x-net-dev packages, as well as the library vendored within adsys and juju-core.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-7197-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  golang-go.net-dev - 1:0.0+git20170629.c81e7f2+dfsg-2ubuntu0.1~esm1 golang-golang-x-net-dev - 1:0.0+git20170629.c81e7f2+dfsg-2ubuntu0.1~esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
